entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Flin Flon Airport 3:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
